resources.string:
1.3
  • DONATE option. Please donate if you like this app and to support development:)
  • Share links to open in Chromer
  • For 6.0, select a text link to open in Chromer
  • Option to choose between multiple Chrome versions
  • About screen
  • Link to Chromer G+ community
  • Changelog screen
  • Link to Chrome in case no custom tab provider is found
1.2.1
  • Reworked share menu. Direct share enabled for 6.0
1.2
  • Change Toolbar color to your liking
  • Configure animations
  • Link to read about chrome custom tabs
  • Option to share Chromer link to others
  • Licenses dialog
  • Tutorial flow performance fixes
  • Icons and imagery updated
1.1
  • Much requested copy and share options
1.0
  • Fixed "no custom tab compatible browser found" issue.
